meanings.sent1: I refilled my water bottle after it was empty.
meanings.sent2: She refilled the bird feeder with fresh seeds.
meanings.sent3: The cookie jar magically refilled every time it was emptied.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter refilled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sun refilled the sky with light after the storm passed.

meanings.sent1: He refilled the gas tank before the long journey.
meanings.sent2: They refilled the candy bowl for the party guests.
meanings.sent3: The fountain pen refilled itself with ink whenever it ran out.
meanings.sent4: His kindness refilled her heart with hope.
meanings.sent5: The music refilled the hall with energy and excitement.
